# CFBoolean | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Foundation ](/documentation/corefoundation)

- [ CFBoolean ](/documentation/corefoundation/cfboolean)

-  CFBoolean 

Class# CFBoolean

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
class CFBoolean
```

## [Overview](/documentation/corefoundation/cfboolean#Overview)

CFBoolean objects are used to wrap boolean values for use in Core Foundation property lists and collection types.

## [Topics](/documentation/corefoundation/cfboolean#topics)

### [CFBoolean Miscellaneous Functions](/documentation/corefoundation/cfboolean#CFBoolean-Miscellaneous-Functions)

[`func CFBooleanGetTypeID() -> CFTypeID`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfbooleangettypeid())Returns the Core Foundation type identifier for the CFBoolean opaque type.[`func CFBooleanGetValue(CFBoolean!) -> Bool`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfbooleangetvalue(_:))Returns the value of a CFBoolean object as a standard C type `Boolean`.### [Constants](/documentation/corefoundation/cfboolean#Constants)

[Boolean Values](/documentation/corefoundation/boolean-values)CFBoolean evaluates to either true or false values where `kCFBooleanTrue` is the true, and `kCFBooleanFalse` is the false value.## [Relationships](/documentation/corefoundation/cfboolean#relationships)

### [Conforms To](/documentation/corefoundation/cfboolean#conforms-to)

- [`Equatable`](/documentation/Swift/Equatable)

- [`Hashable`](/documentation/Swift/Hashable)
